hero.subTitle: Blood Donation
hero.p: Connect donors with those in need. Every donation can save up to three lives.

features.title: Why Choose Our Blood Bank System?
features.description: A powerful and secure platform to efficiently manage donors, hospitals, blood inventory, and operations.
features.donorMatchingDesc: Quickly find compatible donors based on blood type, location, and donation history.
features.hospitalIntegrationDesc: Seamlessly connect with hospitals to fulfill blood requests in real time.
features.inventoryDesc: Monitor and analyze blood stock levels across all types and locations in real time.
features.securityDesc: All data is encrypted and protected according to the highest medical security and privacy standards.
features.reportsDesc: Generate accurate reports on donations, inventory, and demand to support decision-making.
features.appointmentsDesc: Allow donors to schedule their visits easily and receive reminders to maintain regular donations.

donorRegister.title: How It Works
donorRegister.description: Simple steps to become a life-saver and help those in need of blood donations.

register.title: Register
register.description: Sign up as a donor by providing your basic information and medical history for eligibility screening.

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.description: Book an appointment at your preferred time and location, or join a mobile blood drive near you.

donate.title: Donate
donate.description: Complete your donation in a safe, comfortable environment with trained medical professionals.

emergency.title: Hospitals: Request Blood Units
emergency.description: Create and manage urgent blood unit requests easily to reach donors quickly.
emergency.createAnnouncementAlert: Open form to create a new blood request announcement.
emergency.viewAnnouncementsAlert: Navigate to the list of current blood requests.

footer.subtitle: Blood Bank System
footer.description: Connecting blood donors with those in need through our comprehensive blood bank management system. Every donation saves lives and strengthens our community.
